info.title: WakeMiiUp
info.author: Superyoshi
info.details:
WakeMiiUp is not your usual Alarm App. It uses methods to wake you which don't need a TV!

Does your TV make a buzzing noise, so you can't sleep? Switch the TV off and get waked up by light!
Watching a movie on TV, but you want to be noticed when you gotta go to school? The light will tell you! 

Coded by Superyoshi
Full credits at http://wiibrew.org/wiki/User:Superyoshi/WakeMiiUp
